Package edu.cnm.deepdive.model

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.model.Pile
      • edu.cnm.deepdive.model.Stock
        • edu.cnm.deepdive.model.Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shuffleable, Iterable<Card>
    public class Deck
extends Stock
implements Shuffleable
    Encapsulates a single deck of standard playing cards, which can be shuffled, dealt one card at a time, and reshuffled (optionally gathering all previously dealt cards back into the deck).
    Author:
    Nicholas Bennett & Deep Dive Coding Java + Android Cohort 9.

      Initializes this instance with 52 cards, sorted in natural order—i.e.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Initializes this instance with 52 cards, sorted in natural order—i.e. the order enforced by the Comparable<Card> implementation of Card.

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the deck, after gathering all previousy drawn/dealt cards to the deck. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking shuffle(getRng()).
        Specified by:
        shuffle in interface Shuffleable

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle​(boolean gather)
        Shuffles the deck, optionally gathering all previously drawn/dealt cards to the deck. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking shuffle(getRng(), gather).
        Parameters:
        gather - flag specifying whether previously drawn/dealt cards are returned to the deck before shuffling.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle​(Random rng)
        Shuffles the deck contents, after gathering any previously dealt cards to the deck, using the specified source of randomness. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking shuffle(rng, true).
        Specified by:
        shuffle in interface Shuffleable
        Parameters:
        rng - source of randomness for the shuffle.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle​(Random rng,
                    boolean gather)
        Shuffles the deck contents, optionally gathering any previously dealt cards to the deck, and then using the specified source of randomness.
        Parameters:
        rng - source of randomness for the shuffle.
        gather - flag specifying whether previously drawn/dealt cards are returned to the deck before shuffling.

      • sort

        public void sort​(boolean gather)
        Sorts the deck in natural order—that is, according to the order enforced by Card, which implements Comparable<Card>. If gather istrue, previously drawn cards back are gathered back into the deck before sorting.
        Parameters:
        gather - flag specifying whether previously dealt cards should be gathered back into the deck before sorting.

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Sorts the deck in natural order—that is, according to the order enforced by Card, which implements Comparable<Card>—after returning any previously drawn/dealt cards to the deck. The resulting order is the same as that used when the instance is first created via Deck(). Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking sort(true.

      • setRng

        public void setRng​(Random rng)
        Sets the source of randomness that will be used by shuffle(boolean) and shuffle()—that is, those overloads that do not include a parameter for a source of randomness.
        Parameters:
        rng - fallback source of randomness.

      • getRng

        public Random getRng()
        Returns the source of randomness that will be used by shuffle(boolean) and shuffle(). If setRng(Random) has not yet been invoked to set the source of randomness, an instance of SecureRandom will be created and returned by this and subsequent invocations.
        Specified by:
        getRng in interface Shuffleable
        Returns:
        fallback source of randomness.
